mapper.select: select * from travel p where part = #{part} order by ${choice} desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select pg.*,(select count(*) from travelReply where travelIdx = #{idx}) as replyCnt from travel pg where pg.idx = #{idx};
select *, idx as replyIdx from travelReply where travelIdx = #{idx} order by idx desc;
mapper.update: update travel set readNum = readNum + 1 where idx = #{idx};
update travel set goodCount = goodCount + 1 where idx = #{idx};
mapper.delete: delete from travelReply where travelIdx = #{idx}; delete from travel where idx = #{idx};
